reviewText: I didn't realize this movie would be a very poor, unoriginal attempt at remaking THE OMEN until I wasted what felt like endless hours watching it. Same basic plot, but with no added surprises. Stale characters, cheesy acting, and nothing remotely scary in the entire movie. In a word: DULL!
Ok Movie....But what I wish they had was a soundtrack for this Movie. If anyone knows who Composed this Film, please tell Me.
